articles.title: What is CODRocket? 1111111111
articles.body: CODRocket is a lightweight Shopify app that lets merchants accept Cash on Delivery (COD) payments by adding a configurable COD Buy Button and an order form to product and checkout flows. It helps merchants collect delivery instructions, capture extra fees or conditional charges for COD handling, and tag orders so they can be filtered and processed separately.

articles.title: How to Install CODRocket on Your Shopify Store
articles.body: 1) From the Shopify App Store, find CODRocket and click 'Add app'. 2) Grant the requested store permissions (orders, scripts, and storefront access). 3) After installation, open the CODRocket dashboard from your Shopify admin Apps section.

articles.title: Quick Setup Guide (First COD Button)
articles.body: 1) In the CODRocket dashboard choose 'Quick start' → 'Add COD Button'. 2) Pick the placement (product page, cart, or a floating action button) and set a label (for example, 'Pay by COD'). 3) Save and preview on a product page — use a development/sandbox theme first. 4) Place a test order to verify the button appears and the order flow captures the COD option and tags the order.

articles.title: System Requirements & Compatibility
articles.body: CODRocket supports modern Shopify themes (Online Store 2.0 and most legacy themes). Recommended: Shopify store with theme version that supports app blocks for easier placement. Browser compatibility: latest desktop and mobile browsers. If your theme heavily customizes checkout, contact support for guidance on placing the COD Buy Button.
